vulnerable.commit_message: improve fix #72558, while (u>=0) with unsigned int will always be true
vulnerable.cve_desc: Integer overflow in the _gdContributionsAlloc function in gd_interpolation.c in GD Graphics Library (aka libgd) before 2.2.3 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (out-of-bounds memory write or memory consumption) via unspecified vectors.
